title: Ambassador Amza presents credentials to Belgium King
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Picture courtesy: Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Kingdom of Belgium) The Royal Castle in Brussels hosted a grand ceremony of the presentation of credentials by Sri Lankan Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary to the Kingdom of Belgium P.M.Amza to His Majesty King of the Belgians Albert II.
